author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA CRAWLING OVER THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA CRAWLING OVER THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 5:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.0, -74.9 with movement WNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA CRAWLING OVER THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN SEA... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 5:00 AM EDT Thu Oct 23 the center of Melissa was located near 15.0, -74.9 with movement WNW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
